channel.title: Please read see if you know anything
channel.description: I'm looking for how you change the saying the NPC's say. If you know anything, please post. Thanks.

item.title: Please read see if you know anything
item.dc:creator: @nick6554 nick6554
item.description:
@nick6554 wrote:

ook… open up npchandler.java and search what you want to change (for example ill use santa)

so search

GET YOUR HOLIDAY STUFF HERE! HO HO HO

you should see

else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 1) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "GET YOUR HOLIDAY STUFF HERE! HO HO HO"; } }
change whats in the quotes and your all set for example:

else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 1) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "PARTY HATS AND RANDOM STOOF HERE"; } }

this would make santa say “PARTY HATS AND RANDOM STOOF HERE” (no quotes)
hope this helps

Read full topic
item.source: Please read see if you know anything
